In way , investigator assess feasibility effect three variable time . The primary outcome serum concentration neuron-specific enolase ( NSE ) 48 h cardiac arrest . DOC.criteria: Witnessed outofhospital cardiac arrest ventricular fibrillation ( VF ) ventricular tachycardia ( VT ) initial rhythm Delay return spontaneous circulation ( ROSC ) 1045 min start arrest Confirmed suspect cardiac origin Mechanical ventilation Markedly impair level consciousness ( response verbal command Glasgow coma scale [ GCS ] motor score < 5 ) Deferred consent possible likely Active intensive care initiate , include target temperature management ( 3336 C ) Probable withdrawal active ICU care due terminal illness poor prognosis severely reduce functional status cardiac arrest Confirmed suspect intracranial pathology and/or suspicion raise intracranial pressure Pregnancy Severe oxygenation problem ( PaO2 / FiO2 < 100 mmHg ) Severe COPD
